Package com.composum.pages.commons.model

Class ContentDriven<ContentType extends ContentModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.model.AbstractModel
      • com.composum.pages.commons.model.ContentDriven<ContentType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ContentType - the concrete model type of the content child
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, com.composum.sling.core.SlingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    File, Page, Site
    public abstract class ContentDriven<ContentType extends ContentModel>
extends AbstractModel
    the abstract base class for all resource with a 'jcr:content' child which contains the resource properties
